item.title: Fake Fedex Email Delivers Donuts!, (Fri, Feb 27th)
item.source: SANS Internet Storm Center, InfoCON: green
item.content:encoded: It’s Friday, let’s have a look at another simple piece of malware to close a busy week! I received a Fedex notification about a delivery. Usually, such emails are simple phishing attacks that redirect you to a fake login page to collect your credentials. Here, it was a bit different:

item.title: ISC Stormcast For Friday, February 27th, 2026 https://isc.sans.edu/podcastdetail/9828, (Fri, Feb 27th)
item.source: SANS Internet Storm Center, InfoCON: green
